item.title: Talented Group of Halo Fans Shows Off Complete Noble Team Cosplay
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Dedicated fans created an accurate Noble Team cosplay from the Halo series with years of effort.
  • Halo cosplay impressed fans with attention to detail, resembling game characters.
  • Anticipation grows for the next Halo game after the success of other Xbox-owned IPs like Gears of War.

A talented bunch of Halo enthusiasts united to bring to life the entire Noble Team from the Halo series through a remarkably accurate cosplay. The Noble Team is a unit under UNSC's Special Warfare Command Group Three in Halo 's lore and has been featured in mainline games like 2010's Halo: Reach .

For more than two decades, Halo has captivated players and established itself as a top FPS series. Its immense success and rich legacy have also made the IP synonymous with Xbox consoles. As a matter of fact, the franchise is also a popular subject for various kinds of fan art, ranging from a Halo helmet replica to entire costumes put together by dedicated fans.

In a Reddit post, user MHCreativeGrain shared that they got together with their friends to create an impeccable cosplay of the Noble Team from the long-running Halo series. The pictures, taken "a few weeks back," depicted team members, including Carter-A259, Catherine-B320, Emile-A239, Jorge-052, Jun-A266, and Spartan-B312. The Halo cosplayer, who was dressed up as Jun, revealed that the team cosplay involved "a years [sic] worth of work, collaboration and some R&D." They added that successfully pulling off the team cosplay allowed them to "make a dream of mine come true." Further, they announced that the group would have "more gatherings" suited up as the Noble Team in the future.

Passionate Halo Fans Assemble as a Popular Halo UNSC Unit

The images show the Noble Team members from different angles, fully equipped with their gear and weapons, which suggests the cosplay was meticulously planned down to the last detail. In the comments, several Halo fans showered praise on the cosplayers, noting the top-notch quality of the costumes. A user wrote, "Yall [sic] look so awesome. Straight from the game." Another fan commended them and pointed out seeing the group cosplay at a local event. One of the users joked, "... Thought these were some of those insane 1/6 figures."

It has been nearly three years since the last Halo game, Halo Infinite , came out and fans have been eagerly waiting for an announcement regarding the series' next destination. With other popular Xbox-owned IPs like Gears of War and Doom set to get their respective sequels in the near future, there is growing anticipation for the next Halo title to be revealed sooner than later.

With Halo 's 25th anniversary approaching in 2026, there are new rumors circulating that hint at Xbox planning something big for fans of the franchise for the milestone day. While there is little clarity about what the rumored plans entail, many fans hope that it is related to the next chapter in the Halo saga.

item.title: Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes
  • How to Redeem Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes
  • How to Get More Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes

Jujutsu Rumble New Era is a hero-collecting RPG game based on the Jujutsu Kaisen anime and manga series. Players can assemble a team of various characters from the original title, including villains. However, to summon and upgrade units, you will need a lot of resources. In this guide, you will find all of the Jujutsu Rumble New Era codes.

Each of these codes will reward you with several rewards. And among them, there may even be Invitation Cards. So, if you do not want to miss out on these valuable resources, you should redeem codes while they are still active.

All Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes

Working Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes

  • DISCORD3000 - Redeem this code to get 400 Ascension Stones, 5 Advanced Invitation Tickets, and 600 Diamonds
  • Fans101 - Redeem this code to get 2 Advanced Invitation Tickets, 300K Gold, and 100K Character EXP
  • Battle999 - Redeem this code to get 100 Ascension Stones and 100K Gold
  • Fans304 - Redeem this code to get 100 Ascension Stones, 500K Gold, and 299 Diamonds
  • JK6666 - Redeem this code to get 10 Normal Invitation Tickets and 100K Gold
  • CS724 - Redeem this code to get 100K Gold and 100 Diamonds
  • FANS10000 - Redeem this code to get 200 Ascension Stones, 5 Advanced Invitation Tickets, 500K Gold, and 388 Diamonds
  • JJK666 - Redeem this code to get 100 Ascension Stones, 100K Gold, and 188 Diamonds
  • DISCORD30K - Redeem this code to get 500 Ascension Stones, 8 Advanced Invitation Tickets, 600 Diamonds, and 30K Character EXP

Expired Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes

  • CS46
  • GPDISCORD20K

In addition to being able to play as your favorite character in Jujutsu Rumble New Era , you can also follow the storyline of the original series. So, with each new battle, players face stronger enemies, including special-grade curses. To survive, you need to level up your characters and upgrade their equipment. This requires investing a lot of resources, which, fortunately, can be obtained with the help of Jujutsu Rumble New Era codes.

They are a great source of free goodies, as they are available almost from the very beginning of the game. In other words, if you are lucky enough to summon the desired 5-star character, you can immediately upgrade them to a high level.

How to Redeem Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes

Using codes in Jujutsu Rumble New Era is as simple as in most other mobile games. Just follow these simple tips to claim all the free goodies:

  • First, launch Jujutsu Rumble New Era .
  • Then, follow the short tutorial until you are given free rein.
  • After that, click on your profile photo in the upper left corner and go to System Settings.
  • Next, you should select the Pack Exchange option.
  • Finally, enter the code and click the Exchange button to claim the rewards.

How to Get More Jujutsu Rumble New Era Codes

Jujutsu Rumble New Era codes can significantly speed up your progress. Also, as with other mobile RPGs, developers often add new codes to this game. So, if you don't want to miss them, you should visit the official social media of the game:

  • Jujutsu Masters: Cursed Rivals on Google Play
  • Jujutsu Rumble New Era on App Store

Jujutsu Rumble New Era is available on mobile devices.

item.title: How Frostpunk 2 Embraces its Dystopian Themes
item.description:
According to most definitions, a dystopia refers to a society in which there's great suffering and injustice. Dystopian themes and settings have been popular for well over 100 years, with some of the first novels credited with pioneering the genre having been published in the early 1900s. Naturally, these dystopian themes have appeared across all kinds of entertainment mediums, and that includes video games like Frostpunk 2 .

2018's Frostpunk showed how quickly players could sacrifice their humanity and morals for the sake of the greater good, but Frostpunk 2 speeds that process up even faster. Frostpunk 2 is a piece of dystopian fiction through and through, and that's evident pretty much from the moment the game's intro cinematic plays.

Frostpunk 2 Puts Its Dystopian Themes Front and Center

Frostpunk 2 Is a Post-Apocalyptic Survival City-Builder

Without getting too into the weeds with its lore, Frostpunk 2 is set during a post-apocalypse, with its world having just suffered a catastrophic event known as the Great Frost. This Great Frost has covered the world in a thick layer of ice and snow, and it's believed that the vast majority of humanity has succumbed to the cold. Frostpunk 2 sees players assume the role of the leader of one of humanity's last known cities, and their primary task is ensuring the survival of its people, whatever the cost.

Frostpunk 2 Puts Players In Charge of Their Own Dystopia

Naturally, Frostpunk 2 's post-apocalyptic setting lays the perfect groundwork for some dystopian fiction, and it doesn't take long for that to rear its head. When beginning Frostpunk 2 's campaign or its Utopia Builder, players will likely set out to create an ideal society where every citizen is equal, food and resources are abundant, and everyone is free to pursue their own goals and dreams. But Frostpunk 2 has other ideas.

Every few minutes or so, Frostpunk 2 will present players with a dilemma, and ask them to make a decision then and there on the matter. Frostpunk 2 's twist is that the vast majority of these dilemmas only have morbid solutions. For instance, some of Frostpunk 2 's very first moral dilemmas occur in its prologue, when the player needs to stockpile enough food for an oncoming whiteout. It's made repeatedly clear to the player that failing to stockpile food within the time limit will result in a game over.

With that at the forefront of players' minds, Frostpunk 2 delivers a handful of ghoulish prompts. Players are asked if they want to hunt a pack of seals that have just appeared on the settlement's shores, and if they want to allow the group's elders to walk off into the Frostlands to lower the amount of food they need to stockpile.

Once players finish the prologue and take charge of New London, they're given these moral dilemmas at an even more frequent rate, and solutions are often just as macabre. Frostpunk 2 requires the player to use the sequel's Law system and Idea Tree to try and make life better for New London's citizens, but there's only so much the player can achieve at once, essentially requiring the player to prioritize certain groups of people. It doesn't take long before players can find themselves in control of their very own Orwellian state, complete with government-issued soldiers patrolling the streets in search of citizens they can brutally push back in line.

item.title: 9 Best Mashup Games Of All Time
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • The best crossover games feature beloved heroes facing off in unexpected matchups - LEGO Dimensions, Super Smash Bros Ultimate.
  • MultiVersus offers fast, explosive matches & continues expanding with characters from Warner Bros. universe.
  • Dead By Daylight captures horror icons in a thrilling player-vs-player experience with survivors and killers.

Huge crossovers in gaming can be really exciting. While Easter Eggs are satisfying nods for big fans of games that get a reference, the best moments are opportunities for different worlds to collide and beloved heroes to face off against each other.

Some of the biggest video games of all time, no matter their genre, have been successful because of the sheer amount of fan-favorite appearances they feature, and how they let players see faces they know and love interacting in ways that are usually reserved for the pages of fan fiction. Here are the nine most ambitious and best mashup games of all time.

9 Lego Dimensions

Co-Op Brick Breaking Adventure

One of the largest scale toys-to-life games, and another brilliant addition to the LEGO series, LEGO Dimensions gave fans of the brick-breaking series access to a massive number of characters from across a whole slew of unexpected titles. The classic adventure features simple combat, countless collectibles, and levels that present the best moments from the stories they tell. Featuring levels and playable characters like the DC superheroes, the wizards of the Harry Potter series, and even Beetlejuice and The Goonies, fans of any property will find something for them here.

The characters each have playgrounds to be let loose in, vehicles and contraptions to play with, and will all band together to save the block-built universe. While this game followed the LEGO game formula for the most part, the inclusion of physical play with a toys-to-life aspect made the whole game a unique mashup that is mostly for fans of LEGO rather than the properties that star in it.

8 Super Smash Bros Ultimate

Platform Fighter With Gaming Icons

Perhaps the most iconic mashup game of all time, one that raised the bar for fighting games and crossover titles alike, Super Smash Bros. is a series that pits hugely popular video game characters against each other in recognizable locations. While each Smash Bros. title is a perfect example of how to effectively cross over games, Super Smash Bros. Ultimate sets itself apart by following through on its promise: "Everyone is here."

Players can choose between Nintendo mascots like Mario, Pikachu, and Link, but guest characters allow for fighters from all across gaming history to make appearances and represent the best that video games have to offer. Whether it be modern classics like Minecraft or pioneers of genre like Snake of Metal Gear Solid fame, Smash Bros. manages to ride the line between being an exciting party game, a competitive fighter, and a showcase for the best of gaming history.

7 Funko Fusion

Fanboy Favorite Co-Op Brawler

Following in the footsteps of the LEGO series, Funko Fusion uses the visuals of the collectible figures styled after countless movies and TV shows and lets players loose in a variety of stories. A collectathon adventure that sets itself apart from the LEGO games, fans can jump into the worlds of He-Man, The Umbrella Academy, Hot Fuzz, Battlestar Galactica, and even Five Nights At Freddy's .

The sheer range of missions on offer makes this a contender for the crossover game with the widest scope. The game clearly tries to strike a balance; Funko Fusion wants to endear itself to fans of the original properties and give a faithful experience while wrapping the whole thing in a cartoony, approachable package that can appeal to new or unfamiliar fans as well.

6 MultiVersus

Another Platform Fighter With Surprising Guest Stars

Another fighting game that pits unexpected characters against each other, MultiVersus lets fan-favorite Warner Bros. characters fight alongside each other in a clearly Smash Bros. inspired clash. The cast of characters seemed, at first, to be eclectic and strange, but as MultiVersus has developed, players have been won over.

Characters like Arya Stark, The Iron Giant, Batman, Beetlejuice, and Adventure Time's Finn the Human are thrown into fast and explosive matches that earn players points and experience. Unlockable perks, costumes, and characters make for a real sense of progression, and the developers' commitment to continue expanding the game means that this could blossom into an even larger crossover as time passes.

5 Marvel Vs Capcom

Comic Book Characters Meet Gaming Greats

Fighting games make a perfect setting for mash-ups, allowing fans to see plenty of their favorite characters scrapping. One of the most established crossovers in the industry, with a series of popular titles, is the Marvel Vs Capcom line.

Pitting characters from Street Fighter , Darkstalkers , Resident Evil , Mega Man and Strider against the members of the Avengers, the X-Men, and more fan-favorite Marvel Super Heroes, these games have captivated audiences with complex combo mechanics and exciting team up possibilities. The latest collection Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics bundles some of the best fighting games of all time with a huge range of characters and a signature visual style that makes for high-energy, high-stakes battles.

4 Heroes Of The Storm

Blizzards Tour De Force MOBA

While a MOBA may not be everyone's cup of tea, Heroes Of The Storm goes out of its way to capture the best of Blizzard's library, and throws everything together into a crowd-pleasing game with shorter matches and a huge roster. Iconic characters from Starcraft , Warcraft , Overwatch , and Diablo meet with more rogue choices to bring heaps of possibilities to the 5v5 matchups.

Players have a slew of abilities that can be upgraded using group experience that is shared between the team in each match. Mounts and Hearthstones ensure that fans of Blizzard's massive catalog of distinct characters will find something familiar. Heroes Of The Storm might not have become as popular as some of the other massive online games under Blizzard's belt, but it is still a hugely successful mashup game in its own right.

3 Mortal Kombat Vs DC Universe

Kombatants Meet Comic Book Heroes

Mortal Kombat is no stranger to strange crossovers, bringing in characters like the Terminator or Robocop to engage in the messy fatalities and gory fights that make this series infamous. However, perhaps its most ambitious crossover title is Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe . Letting Raiden and Scorpion test their fighting skills against Superman and Batman while still preserving the weighty combat and bloody brutalities meant that fans of both properties could get invested.

The story mode lets players take on both Shao Khan and Darkseid to defeat the epic villains from both worlds in a narrative that sees the universes collide with catastrophic results. This opportunity to see unlikely allies and bickering rivals makes for a captivating mashup.

2 Dead By Daylight

Iconic Horror Heroes Unleashed

A group of four plucky Survivors dart in the shadows towards the generator, repairing it to desperately try to power up the gates that stand between themselves and freedom. One crazed killer hunts them across the map, hoping to sacrifice them to a great and unknowable horror. Dead By Daylight uses player-vs-player competition to serve up horror scares featuring terrifying icons from the best the horror genre has to offer.

A Xenomorph, Pinhead from Hellraiser , the evil Chucky doll, and Freddy Kreuger himself all use their signature skills to defeat the other players who are forced to flee from the all-powerful killer. Dead By Daylight has quickly become a celebration of horror staples, letting players use different tactics to either escape, or to hunt.

1 Puyo Puyo Tetris 2

Puzzling Perfection

One of the least expected crossover titles, Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 is a mashup of two of gaming's biggest arcade puzzlers, combining the neat block stacking gameplay of Tetris with the pattern matching loop of Puyo Puyo . Local PvP gameplay sees players collect powerups to make their opponents' board more chaotic and difficult, and the Fusion Mode slides both games into each other with chaotic results.

Tetrominoes are heavy enough to fall to the bottom of the board, while the Puyos sit at the top. The addictive and rhythmic gameplay loop of one of the bestselling series of all time finds a worthy match and succeeds in providing a surprisingly effective party battler.

item.title: This Combination of Starfield's Sarah Morgan and a Terrormorph is Utterly Horrifying
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Starfield player creates horrific mixture of Terrormorph and Sarah Morgan, nicknaming it "Sarahmorph."
  • The glitch showcases Sarah violently twitching, sliding into rooms, scaring other characters, prompting funny nicknames.
  • Other players share hilarious glitches involving violent tendencies of NPCs like super jumps or knocking out other characters.

An unfortunate player of the space-themed title, Starfield , has ended up accidentally creating a horrific combination of the Chair of Constellation, Sarah Morgan, and the game's Terrormorph, an alien species found throughout the Settled Systems. Bethesdas Starfield was released in 2023, and the story follows a team of space miners and explorers hired by the Constellation group to hunt down mysterious artifacts across the galaxy.

The open-world title has been out for a little over a year now, and despite the game's initial rocky start, Bethesda has endeavored to make improvements, which include adding the REV-8 to Starfield , the game's long-awaited first land vehicle. In a game as vast as Starfield , a few quirks here and there are a given, and many players have caught more than a few hilarious glitches involving the game's NPC companions.

In a post on Reddit, user B0sstrich has managed to capture a terrifying glitch that involves Starfield 's NPC companion, Sarah Morgan. In the horrific clip, Sarah, who is the Chair of Constellation, can be seen violently twitching as the player moves the NPC across an area in the game, even scaring another character due to her bizarre behavior as she slides into a room. B0sstrich said that this alarming glitch happened whenever they were messing around with the console commands, promoting them to nickname Sarah as the "Sarahmorph." This name is in reference to Starfield 's Terrormorph creatures, an alien species found throughout the game.

Starfield Player Creates Horrific Mix of a Terrormorph and Sarah Morgan

Some of the comments in the Reddit thread have expressed shock and horror at the player's scary recreation of Starfield 's Sarah Morgan, who can sometimes be seen by some players as rather dull and uninteresting. One commenter alarmingly asked the poster, "dear god, what have you done?," as another user said that the horrifying Sarah Morgan glitch reminded them of one of the Hiss from Remedy Entertainment's, Control . Another Redditor hilariously pointed out that the glitch reminded them of Edgar, the cockroach alien in a human suit, from Men in Black .

Recently, another player showcased a hilarious clip of Starfield 's Sarah Morgan using a Super Mario -style combo as she jumped on top of a NPC, sending them flying out of the game. Apparently, other characters in the sci-fi title can have violent tendencies, too. Starfield 's Vasco knocked out a quest-critical NPC character during a dialogue scene in another comedic glitch from the game. Even though Starfield 's NPCs are a hit-or-miss for some players, there's no denying that the Bethesda title has some of the funniest, and weirdest, bugs in gaming.
